description.brief: Python library for interacting with ADA.

package.description: Python library for interacting with ADA through OpenRAVE. ADA is an "Assistive Dexterous Arm" developed by the Personal Robotics Lab at Carnegie Mellon University, intended for helping elderly and people with disabilities. The system is composed of a Kinova Mico arm for manipulation accompanied by several sensors for perception and world modeling.
package.author: Tekin Mericli
